resources.string: Album List - This screen wil display all the songs in albums activity.
Album Activity - This screen display all the albums.
Artist List - This screen displays all the songs in artists activity.
Artist Activity - This screen display all the artists.
Project4 - This is the main page of our music app.
Liked Song - This screen display all the songs liked by us.
Payment - This activity helps us pay for the songs we want to add in our music app.
Now Playing - This screen display all the songs we are currently playing from the media player.
Playlist Activity - This screen display all the playlists created by us.
Playlist List - This screen displays all the songs in playlists activity.
Song - This screen displays all the songs in our app.
